From writing games in BASIC in the 80РђЎs, building websites in Dreamweaver in the 90РђЎs, to working with VB & .NET in enterprise in the 00's IРђЎve had a lifelong interest in computing, engineering and design. Seeking greater technical and intellectual challenge in my work I retrained as a full-stack developer, graduating from [Makers Academy](https://makers.tech/software-engineering-bootcamp) bootcamp in 2014. I continued to code alongside my business and product management roles until switching to full-time software development in January 2023.
